feed.title: Hemmelig Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: UI improvements
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • UI improvements by @the-voidl in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/340

New Contributors

  • @the-voidl made their first contribution in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/340

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.0.10...v6.1.0

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: remove lite by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/351
  • feat: collapse security form by default by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/352
  • chore: minor layout adjustments by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/353

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.1.0...v6.1.1

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.1.2

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.1.2...v6.1.3

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.1.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: set the git tag version and sha by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/357
  • Revert "chore: set the git tag version and sha" by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/358

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.1.3...v6.1.4
